successes.title: Carla Hall's Southern Kitchen
successes.description: Carla Hall's Southern Kitchen: a slow-cooked, fast-served neighborhood eatery serving up old-fashioned southern comfort goodness.

Pledges.description:
HOT CHICKEN!
You’ll get a download of my Nashville Hot Chicken recipe and updates on the restaurant until we open, PLUS voting rights on upcoming decisions.

WHOOPIE!
Everything in the $1 level + a whoopie pie of the month coupon good for 12 months (pickup in store) + a huge THANKS on the Southern Kitchen website.

GET BAKING! Everything in the $1 level + Carla's Lemon Black Pepper Dry Cookie Mix and a Southern Kitchen bandana in the restaurant's signature color. Simply add butter to the mix, throw on the bandana, roll up your sleeves and get in the kitchen to start cooking!

BE A FOUNDER!
Everything in the $10 level + your name, in full, on my FOUNDERS WALL in EVERY Southern Kitchen we open. Forever. Seriously.

FAMILY MEAL TO GO! Everything in the $25 level + the “I Swear I Cooked” family style meal from my official Southern Kitchen menu, including 12pc chicken: 3 breasts, 3 wings, 3 thighs, 3 drumsticks, 12 tenders, 2 large sides, 1 gallon of homemade tea or lemonade. Pick up from the restaurant upon opening. To carry all that tasty food we will help you hail a taxi! You won't get a deal on my Nashville Hot Chicken like this ever again!

PICK A CARD, ALL THE CARDS!
Everything in the $25 level + 12 limited edition recipe cards, including a signed Hot Chicken card, AND a signed Southern Kitchen menu. These prints will not be available like this ever again.

LOOKING GOOD!
Everything in the $50 level + a limited edition t-shirt that I created with my friends at DCXV in Nashville. This shirt will not be available anywhere else, ever.

JUST FOR YOU!
Everything in the $50 level + a copy of my “Comfort Foods” cookbook, personalized just for you (or anyone you choose).

SUNDAY SUPPER!
Everything in the $25 level + 2 tickets to a Sunday Supper event of your choice in 2015, where I’ll cook a special, intimate, southern supper. Do drop in!

LET’S PARTY!
Everything in the $25 level + 2 tickets to one of our soft open parties in 2015, ALL food included (no alcohol, sorry Kickstarter’s rule!) and with a special event gift bag to brag to all your friends.

NOW WE’RE COOKIN!
Everything in the $25 level + you’ll join ME in a small group of other Backers in a semi-private cooking event in the restaurant + a copy of my “Comfort Foods” cookbook, personalized just for you, and a Carla Hall Southern Kitchen chef's coat.

DINE AL DESKO!
Everything in the $25 level + my team will cater a southern meal for you in your home or office (lunch or dinner) up to 15 people. Sides, pies, (chicken) thighs—the works. All you have to do is come pick it up.

LET'S EAT!
Everything in the $25 level + dinner at the restaurant! Bring 9 of your friends for a Southern Kitchen dinner cooked by me and my team. All food included (but not alcohol, sorry Kickstarter's rule!), and you'll all go home with a special event gift bag.

THE BIG SHOW!
Everything in the $25 level + my Southern Kitchen will cater a party for up to 100 guests. Food is on us but the staffing, delivery, tax, and alcohol (sorry, Kickstarter's rule!) is not included.

THE KITCHEN SINK!
Everything in the $25 level + You. Me. My crew. My kitchen. All day. We’ll all spend the day together cooking and just hanging out! Tell 10 of your friends to show up for dinner to devour the feast we’ll make together! PLUS you'll get a personalized chef's coat autographed by me and the entire restaurant crew.
